card.title: The forest of wonder
card.author: Max
card.description: Yeah, i'll fill this in later.

1.name: forest
1.description: This is the forest, where you must go and find the legendary pool of the daemons. This is a mythical location which is rumored to be hidden deep within this forest. You are on a quest to find it and claim the ultimate treasure... The Gaurof Sword.

objects.name: stick
objects.description: a fallen branch

objects.name: river
objects.description: a big wide river that blocks your path. How would you cross it?

objects.name: stones
objects.description: sleek and wet pebbles

objects.name: trees
objects.description: There is more of a dense coverage of trees this time. You can't see anything in the distance.

5.name: the boulder
5.description: There is a big boulder blocking your path as you wander up this way. How will you get past?

objects.name: boulder
objects.description: It is blocking your path

7.name: hill
7.description: On the top of the hill you can see a little. Here there is little trees.

objects.name: river
objects.description: You see a river that blocks your path to the north of where you started

objects.name: boulder
objects.description: You see a big boulder to the right of where you started

objects.name: camp
objects.description: You see a monster camp to the south of where you started

objects.name: mountain
objects.description: You can see a mountain in the distance some way away from where you started

objects.name: trees
objects.description: Trees blocking what looks important to the south

objects.name: staircase
objects.description: A staircase that leads up into the monster camp

objects.name: post
objects.description: Thankfully they don't see you because of the trees

objects.name: bokoblin
objects.description: A monster bent on killing you

objects.name: monster
objects.description: A lizard about the same size as you that will kill you.

11.name: up the spiral staircase
11.description: You can see the tops of trees and the monster camp which is also peeking out

objects.name: trees
objects.description: Still you can't see anything as there are too many trees

objects.name: bokoblin
objects.description: It will shoot you with its arrows and alert the others

13.name: the monster camp level 1
13.description: This is the first level of the monster camp. The higher you get, the harder the monsters.

objects.name: bokoblin
objects.description: It has a sword

objects.name: chest
objects.description: it has a shield in it!

objects.name: outline
objects.description: You can faintly see if you look hard enough a mountain with many apple trees in the distance

objects.name: monster
objects.description: It will wake if you attack it or if the watchtower monster alerted them

objects.name: stick
objects.description: it's a random twig

17.name: monster camp level 3
17.description: The monsters here are at there worst.

objects.name: boss
objects.description: the big baddy

objects.name: bokoblin
objects.description: guards Jeremy

objects.name: Jeremy
objects.description: A local who knows about where you are going and helps make a bridge across the river... if you have enough wood

objects.name: key
objects.description: key to a house

objects.name: chest
objects.description: It has a sword in it (at last)

21.name: clearing
21.description: This is a clearing in the forest. If you have Jeremy then a glowing blue stag leaps out and Jeremy identifies it as the creatures you need to find. Then he follows the stag and brings you off the path to somewhere special...

objects.name: stag
objects.description: only appears if Jeremy is with you

23.name: lots of trees
23.description: As you walk through the trees you see a fallen tree - it's HUGE! You could make a whole boat out of it *hint hint*

objects.name: trunk
objects.description: Jeremy can use this to make a tree... If he had a saw

25.name: house
25.description: In this part of the forest you see a house. It has a locked door.

objects.name: House
objects.description: A house with a locked door

objects.name: Inside
objects.description: You can see an outline of a bed through a window, but the house is very dark so that's it.

27.name: somewhere special
27.description:
This is a special place - it is the place where glowing blue and yellow stags meet. The blue are the male and the yellow are the female. They are all snuggling. It is so dark, but the stags light everything up. They do this for a while before you decide to get closer and they get scared. They all run away. You reach out for them but to no avail. Next time you should bring your camera. 
But you can see a saw near a tree. They must have brought it here so the people couldn't chop down the trees.

28.name: inside the house level 1
28.description: Inside the house it is very dark. You can barely see a thing.

objects.name: Spider
objects.description: Bites your toe

objects.name: post
objects.description: Hits your head

objects.name: staircase
objects.description: you trip on it and graze your knee

objects.name: bed
objects.description: the springs scare you to bits as they randomly spring out

objects.name: closet
objects.description: has inside it a ladder

32.name: tree blocks your path
32.description: A HUGE tree blocks your path. It is covered in thorns. How will you get past?

35.name: mountain
35.description:
You slowly climb up the mountain...
It has become night time and it is raining.

objects.name: tree
objects.description: tree full of apples

objects.name: box
objects.description: This prevents Jeremy from going any further

37.name: further up the mountain
37.description: There is a big hinox that is blocking your way. You will need to fight it!

objects.name: Hinox
objects.description: The biggest, fattest monster alive

39.name: top of the mountain
39.description: It is night. The stars are bright. Insert rest of deeply spiritual text i inputted earlier here on how a glowing stag leads you to the place and nice things happen and yay! The end!

40.name: the top of the mountain
40.description: It is thundering. Insert rest of text here on how you don't see anything and so go to sleep for the night.

objects.name: The Gaurof Sword
objects.description: The sword that Lonk pulled and accidentally destroyed his town with the Tiwlight Raelm

42.name: top of mountain day
42.description: It is day. You still don't see any creatures. What do you do?
